description: This table contains the location of bleeding and suppuration findings documented during a patient's periodontal exam.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENT_BL_SUP_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the physical location where bleeding or suppuration findings were noted.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Facial Distal


Facial


Facial Mesial


Lingual Mesial


Lingual


Lingual Distal


Facial Side


Lingual Side
